author: legoguy_3000_
review:
I have got all of these bits in a box. It's very useful if you lose one of these pieces in a different set.

Pros:
lots of pins
useful if you're a technic fan

cons:
easily loseable
if you only want one technic piece you have to buy all of them
not very exiting because its just some technic connectors

4/5

author: hustla187
title: Love Those Joints
review: If you are running low on joint pieces or connectors, this is a set that you should pick up. It has alot of different designs so you know that you will get the right one. Overall, this is a good supply set to pick up.
